Felipe Buccioni

About
Self-driven, self-made with more than 20 years of experience interested and motivated by continuous improvement, passionate about innovation. My professional life is spent in a variety of industries and markets, where I have led several projects in software development and information technologies. The value that I will be able to bring to your work is finding creative, fresh and flexible solutions to complicated challenges.
